"wimp" george marsha, amanda, jr., noah, grayce & mady sent flowers to the family of winfred m. "wimp" george. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! bb buck & cathy barb. jun 14 at 9:12 pm the world does not see how a child of christ serves his fellow man or the sacrifices he makes for his family and friends; but god sees and awards accordingly.; wimp was always willing to share a smile or a joke with anyone he met and anyone needing a helping hand he was ready and willing to lend one or two of his own.. we count ourselves blessed to have known him. the angels in heaven rejoiced on saturday evening when he came home to meet his father face to face. love to the whole family; wimp was wonderful man. love in christ. buck & cathy barb. comment share comment share facebook twitter
